messages.title: LABOUR’S TAX ON JOBS WILL KILL THE RECOVERY
messages.content: The re-election of Gordon Brown's government with more debt, waste and taxes will bring us a new recession. 13 years working people have seen their taxes go up and their money wasted. Labour's national insurance tax will cost jobs and cut wages.

messages.title: BACKING THE NHS
messages.content: The NHS is our number one priority. We back it and want to improve it for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aiming to reduce debt, waste, and taxes; opposing Labour's planned increase in national insurance which they claim will cost jobs and lower wages.
Prioritizing the NHS; pledging improvements each year without specifying details.
Championing village schools and supporting the investment in Frome College.

issues.economy: Concern over the increasing taxes and waste under Labour. Labour's planned increase in national insurance could cost jobs.
issues.education: Support for village schools and investment in education.
issues.health: Backing the NHS as a top priority.

endorsements.endorsement: This [election] is the first time for many years voters could waste their votes... I want new leaders like Annunziata Rees-Mogg in the Conservative team.

quotes.text: The Business Secretary and key architect of Labour election strategy told the Western Morning News that the Lib Dems have a more comprehensive strategy there [Somerton and Frome] than we do.

images.caption: Annunziata is a champion of village schools and supported the 1.1 million investment in Frome College.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet promotes the candidacy of Annunziata Rees-Mogg for the Conservatives, featuring endorsements and quotes, as well as highlighting key policies and stances, especially against the tax policy of Gordon Brown's Labour government.
